title: Twitter Certificate Content
description: Certificate content for X/Twitter account verification data.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the account was created. Must be less than the current time.

id.description: The numeric ID of the Twitter account.

followersCount.description: The number of followers the account has.

followingCount.description: The number of accounts the user is following.

listedCount.description: The number of lists the account is a member of.

tweetCount.description: The number of tweets the account has posted.

username.description: The username of the Twitter account.
